title: M. Murat Ardag, Ph.D.
text:
Psychometrics, psycholinguistics, modeling subjectivity, and comparative politics are among my research interests.



I served as the Turkish Language Group Leader in the European Commission Joint Research Centre’s ValuesML - Unravelling Expressed Values in the Media for Informed Policy Making project. I was an affiliated postdoc fellow at Bremen International School of Social Sciences, Constructor University. Before this, I worked a postdoc fellow at the Psychology & Methods department in a project funded by Business Finland and the Culture Factor Group. At the University of Oldenburg, I worked as the interim academic coordinator of European Master in Migration & Intercultural Relations, also as a lecturer at the Institute of Social Sciences.
Before academic life, I was a sales manager at a multi-national outdoor advertising company in Istanbul. During my undergrad studies, I worked as a music journalist.
